insight: While the Fano plane has transitive symmetry on triangles, mapping points to a Shatkona (up/down triangles) fixes a vertical axis creating "gravity" that locks exactly 1 pair of triangles (Sa-Pa, the Achala Swaras) and leaves 5 pairs free to vary (Vikrut Swaras). This proves the Indian musical scale structure is the necessary result of applying orientation to Fano geometry.
